Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the actions of a fictional character in an animated show accurately reflect real-life situations and behavior of public officials.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the use of the "Simpsons" clip, which is that it is being circulated to criticize public officials who seemingly abandoned their constituents in a time of crisis.
